registry.title: CMP Well-Known URI Path Segments
registry.expert: Hendrik Brockhaus, David von Oheimb, John Gray

record.name: p
record.description: Indicates that the next path segment specifies, e.g., a CA or certificate profile name

record.name: initialization
record.description: Enrolling an End Entity to a New PKI over HTTP

record.name: certification
record.description: Enrolling an End Entity to a Known PKI over HTTP

record.name: keyupdate
record.description: Updating a Valid Certificate over HTTP

record.name: pkcs10
record.description: Enrolling an End Entity Using a PKCS #10 Request over HTTP

record.name: revocation
record.description: Revoking a Certificate over HTTP

record.name: getcacerts
record.description: Get CA Certificates over HTTP

record.name: getrootupdate
record.description: Get Root CA Certificate Update over HTTP

record.name: getcertreqtemplate
record.description: Get Certificate Request Template over HTTP

record.name: getcrls
record.description: CRL Update Retrieval over HTTP

record.name: nested
record.description: Batching Messages over HTTP

record.name: ir
record.description: Enrolling an End Entity to a New PKI over CoAP

record.name: cr
record.description: Enrolling an End Entity to a Known PKI over CoAP

record.name: kur
record.description: Updating a Valid Certificate over CoAP

record.name: p10
record.description: Enrolling an End Entity Using a PKCS #10 Request over CoAP

record.name: rr
record.description: Revoking a Certificate over CoAP

record.name: crts
record.description: Get CA Certificates over CoAP

record.name: rcu
record.description: Get Root CA Certificate Update over CoAP

record.name: att
record.description: Get Certificate Request Template over CoAP

record.name: crls
record.description: CRL Update Retrieval over CoAP

record.name: nest
record.description: Batching Messages over CoAP

record.name: ann
record.description: The path to send a GET request with the CoAP Observe Option to register for CMP announcement messages.
